radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT ABDOMEN WITHOUT AND WITH IV CONTRAST
radiographic_examinations.findings: Mild dependent atelectasis at the lung bases, gallbladder distended with multiple areas of wall discontinuity, extravasation of gallbladder fluid and gallstones, consistent with perforated gallbladder. Inflammatory fat stranding and a small amount of fluid in the adjacent mesentery. Mild intrahepatic biliary ductal dilatation. No definite focal pancreatic mass seen; pancreatic duct is dilated. No vascular involvement or lymphadenopathy.
